email_body: what kind of odds. the market is saying it's 8:1 chance. I'm saying there is a much better chance than that. i think it's 2:1 From: Jennifer Fraser/ENRON@enronXgate on 04/11/2001 04:11 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: RE: ng views wanna wager on that?
